channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why sportsbooks like FanDuel and DraftKings really need March Madness bettors to lose this year
item.description: March Madness numbers to know include $3.1 billion in wagers and nearly $5 million in earnings for one player.

item.title: Women’s March Madness teams are being paid for the first time — but they’re splitting $200 million less than the men
item.description: Players won’t receive any of the prize money themselves, but their schools’ basketball programs and athletic departments reap the rewards.

item.title: How to win the high-momentum stock game
item.description: Momentum stocks have historically beaten the stock market by a large margin — until recently.

item.title: Copper settles near a record high. Why it’s not a great economic indicator anymore.

item.title: Using options as a less risky way to bet on a comeback in a beaten-up tech leader
item.description: Nishant Pant describes a bull call spread on Salesforce.

item.title: Nvidia has a big conference this week. What major analysts expect and how stock will react
item.description: Investors are watching for updates at Nvidia's GTC AI conference that could reignite confidence in the stock.

item.title: Goldman recommends these cheap and stable stocks to survive the market volatility
item.description: Investors should focus on stocks that offer both stability and visibility, according to Goldman Sachs.

item.title: Buy this language app stock that’s set to rally more than 30%, JMP says

item.title: Goldman Sachs upgrades this fashion stock thanks to limited exposure to tariffs
item.description: Ralph Lauren is prepared to weather near-term tariff-related headwinds, Goldman Sachs said.
